item.description:
This has been generally for Advanced Beginners to MODERATE hikers - BEGINNERS may come however please be physically fit enough to walk multiple rocky hills for about 2.5 miles. I would like to move at a moderate pace to make this a good workout. Email me if you have any questions.

We are meeting at the Blue Hills Reservation Headquarters (address above). You can park in the parking lot across from the State Police Station.

We'll head up the North Skyline trail to the top of Great Blue Hill (we will have great views from the tower), and then head back down the South Skyline trail back to our cars. On average, this hike has taken about 1.5 hours.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in a Gray Nissan Altima - Cell: 774-218-1626
item.name: Weekday Hike to Great Blue Hill
